subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: When it comes time to pick a champion in an N.C.A.A. bracket, people tend to cluster around a few of the favorites. But the tournament is usually not as kind to favorites as the fans are.
snippet: When it comes time to pick a champion in an N.C.A.A. bracket, people tend to cluster around a few of the favorites. But the tournament is usually not as kind to favorites as the fans are.
